articles.description: Mick Justin saw his son earn two promotions with his hometown club, play for Leicester City in the Premier League, and represent his country with England Under-21s
articles.content:
Luton Town have paid tribute to Mick Justin, the father of Leicester City right-back James, following his death last month.
Mick had been battling a serious illness.
Before his death he saw his son become a favourite with the Hatters, watched him play in th… [+957 chars]

articles.title: Harry Maguire makes mentality admission over Man Utd's season - Mirror Online
articles.description: Captain says Manchester United have been their own worst enemy this season as he sets silverware target for when football resumes following coronavirus pandemic
articles.content:
Harry Maguire says Manchester United must develop a stronger mentality if they are to get back to the top of English football.

articles.author: Samit Sarkar
articles.title: PGA Tour 2K21 trailer teases new golf game - Polygon
articles.description: 2K Sports is returning to golf with PGA Tour 2K21, a continuation of HB Studios’ The Golf Club franchise. A teaser trailer released Wednesday promises a full reveal on May 14. No platforms or release date were announced.
articles.content: Could golf be going annual again?
